geometry.code:
import random

def generate_random_geometric_graph_geometry(params, N):
    radius = float(params.get('R', 1.0))
    count = int(N or params.get('N') or params.get('rgg_nodes', 0) or 4096)
    count = max(1, count)
    rng = random.Random(params.get('seed', 0))
    stretch = float(params.get('rgg_radius', 0.2) or 0.2)
    points = []
    for _ in range(count):
        x = rng.uniform(-radius, radius)
        y = rng.uniform(-radius, radius) * stretch
        z = rng.uniform(-radius, radius)
        points.append((x, y, z))
    return points

meta.label: Graphe géométrique
meta.description: Nuage de particules distribué selon une densité anisotrope.
